title: Nikita and the Magical Garden of Responsibility
storyContent: {"title":"Nikita and the Magical Garden of Responsibility","pages":[{"text":"Nikita found a shiny key. \"What is this for?\" he asked. A magic door appeared. \"Come with me,\" said the door. Nikita stepped through and smiled bright.","imagePrompt":"Illustrate a 5-year-old Nikita with short black hair and twinkling eyes, holding a small shiny key in his hand. He wears a blue T-shirt, yellow shorts, and red sneakers. Nikita stands in a lush, magical garden, full of colorful flowers and a big, mysterious door in front of him. Create a whimsical, light-dappled scene that gives a sense of wonder and possibility, using a watercolor style."}],"moral":"Responsibility means taking care of things we value."}
